settings.title: Customer Support Center
settings.text: If talking to a real-life human is more your thing, you can reach our Customer Happiness Team via email (below).

settings.title: How long does it take to process my order?
settings.answer:
We aim to process all orders within 1 business day. However we kindly ask for up to 3 business days to process all orders for shipment.

Note: orders will not be processed during non-business hours, which includes holidays and weekends.

settings.title: Can I cancel my order?
settings.answer: Due to using a 3rd Party Logistics Provider for fulfilment and shipping, we cannot guarentee an order can be canceled once it is received. However, there is a 14 day return window that you can return it to us for a full refund. Regardless, please contact us immediately, and we will do our best to accommodate your request.

settings.title: What is the difference between compostable and biodegradable?
settings.answer: Compostable is a term used for an organic material that is broken down into sugar or a nutrient-dense mixture called humus. Compostable materials require a specific amount of water, carbon, and nitrogen in order to fully decompose. Biodegradable is a term used for materials that can be broken down naturally through microorganisms. To eliminate as much waste as possible, EcoBlvd ensures that all of our products are both compostable and biodegradable! We want you to know that your little change to compost or recycle your accessories will make a big difference in ending plastic dependency!

settings.title: What is the proper way to dispose of EcoBlvd accessories?
settings.answer: You can either dispose of your case at home using composting or at an industrial composting facility or ship it back to us using the included free shipping label. If you choose to return it to us, you will receive a 20% discount on your new case and your old case will be taken care of. Please contact us if you would like to return it.

settings.title: What is Prop 65? I see it on your charger and cable packaging.
settings.answer:
A company selling products in California must comply with California's Proposition 65 law.

In California, the Office of Environmental Health Hazard Assessment ("OEHHA") maintains a database of over 800 natural and synthetic chemicals that are known to pose health risks. In accordance with Proposition 65, businesses selling products within the state are required to warn potential consumers when a product contains any listed chemical in an amount that exceeds certain limits.

Prop 65 is not a product safety law, but a law that protects consumers' right to know about their exposure to different chemicals. The warnings are among the world's most stringent and often far more strict than federal standards.

There is a wide range of Prop 65 warnings throughout California - in restaurants, grocery stores, hotels, schools, hospitals, and on a wide variety of consumer products. Prop 65 warnings must also be provided on websites or in catalogs for all products sold by internet and mail order retailers.

The warning is because LifeVine cables and PowerPlant chargers contain recycled plastic parts.

Click here for more information on Proposition 65.

settings.content: We use all major carriers, and local courier partners. Youâ€™ll be asked to select a delivery method during checkout.

settings.title: What is the shipping policy?
settings.answer: Once your order is placed, you will receive a confirmation email letting you know that our fulfillment team has received your order. Once your order is fulfilled, you will receive an email notification with your tracking information. Shipping fees are non-refundable in the case of returns.

settings.title: Do you ship overseas?
settings.answer: Yes, we ship all over the world. Shipping costs will apply, and will be added at checkout.

settings.title: Where does the order ship from?
settings.answer: All orders are shipped from our fulfilment and shipping partner based in Los Angeles, California.

settings.title: How do I file a claim for a replacement?

settings.text: Have questions about your order, or a general enquiry?
